p: Firstly, an ultrasound examination can be used as an imaging modality in the rapid assessment of illness. A critical consultation ultrasonic examination (CCUE) is recommended in COVID-19-infected patients with symptoms of dyspnea or circulation fluctuation, for prompt analysis of possible complications. An increase in the number of B-lines and the area of the consolidation may suggest progression of the lung disease. Otherwise, changes in the heart size and ventricular wall thickness, segmental wall motion abnormalities, and decreased ventricular contractile function could indicate heart injury [ 48].
